verses.1: Moses in biakbuk dingsakin, tua biakbuk le a nazatte khempeuh sathau nuhin ap a, biakna tau le a nazatte khempeuh sathau nuhin a ap a man ni-in,
verses.2: Israel makaite, a beh ukpite, minam makaite ahi a kisim mite a ukte in,
verses.3: buk a nei leeng guk le bawngtal sawm le nih Topaʼ mai ah paipih uh a, leeng khat ah makai nih, mi khat ah bawngtal khat ciatin sehin a biakna uh pia uh hi. Amaute in biakbuk mai ah tuate pia uh hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah,
verses.5: “Kikhopna buk nasepna ah zat dingin amauʼ tung panin tuate sang inla, a nasep ciat uh tawh kizui-in Levi mite pia in,” a ci hi.
verses.6: Tua ahih ciangin Moses in leengte le bawngtalte saangin Levi mite a pia hi.
verses.7: Amauʼ nasep tawh kizui-in Gershon mite tungah leeng nih le bawngtal li pia hi.
verses.8: Siampi Aaronʼ tapa Ithamarʼ ukna nuai ah na a sem Merari mite tungah amauʼ nasep tawh kizui-in leeng li le bawngtal giat pia hi.
verses.9: Ahih hangin Kohath mite tungah bangmah pia lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh liangko ah a puak ding uh a siangtho nate kep ding amaute tavuan kipia hi.
verses.10: Biakna tau sathau a kinuh ni-in a ap nadingin makaite in a biakna uh biakna tau mai ah pia uh hi.
verses.11: Topa in Moses kiangah, “Biakna tau ap nadingin makai khat in ni khat ciat a biakna uh pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.12: A ni masa ni-a biakna a pia pa pen Judah minam, Amminadabʼ tapa Nahshon ahi hi.
verses.13: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.14: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.15: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.16: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat,
verses.17: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Amminadabʼ tapa Nahshonʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.18: A ni nih ni-in Issakhar mite a makai, Zuarʼ tapa Nethanel in biakna pia hi.
verses.19: A biak nadingin amah in biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.20: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.21: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.22: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.23: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Zuarʼ tapa Nethanelʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.24: A ni thum ni-in Zebulun mite a makai, Helonʼ tapa Eliab ahi hi.
verses.25: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.26: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.27: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.28: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.29: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Helonʼ tapa Eliabʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.30: A ni li ni-in Reuben mite a makai, Shedeurʼ tapa Elizur ahi hi.
verses.31: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.32: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.33: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.34: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.35: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Shedeurʼ tapa Elizurʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.36: A ni nga ni-in Simeon mite a makai, Zurishaddaiʼ tapa Shelumiel ahi hi.
verses.37: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.38: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.39: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.40: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.41: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Zurishaddaiʼ tapa Shelumielʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.42: A ni guk ni-in Gad mite a makai, Deuelʼ tapa Eliasaf ahi hi.
verses.43: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.44: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.45: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.46: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.47: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Deuelʼ tapa Eliasafʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.48: A ni sagih ni-in Efraim mite a makai, Ammihudʼ tapa Elishama ahi hi.
verses.49: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.50: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.51: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.52: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.53: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Ammihudʼ tapa Elishamaʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.54: A ni giat ni-in Manasseh mite a makai, Pedahzurʼ tapa Gamaliel ahi hi.
verses.55: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.56: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.57: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.58: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.59: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Pedahzurʼ tapa Gamalielʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.60: A ni kua ni-in Benjamin mite a makai, Gideoniʼ tapa Abidan ahi hi.
verses.61: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.62: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.63: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.64: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.65: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Gideoniʼ tapa Abidanʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.66: A ni sawm ni-in Dan mite a makai, Ammishaddaiʼ tapa Ahiezer ahi hi.
verses.67: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.68: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.69: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.70: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.71: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Ammishaddaiʼ tapa Ahiezerʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.72: A ni sawm le khat ni-in Asher mite a makai, Okranʼ tapa Pagiel ahi hi.
verses.73: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.74: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.75: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat;
verses.76: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.77: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Okranʼ tapa Pagielʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.78: A ni sawm le nih ni-in Naftali mite a makai, Enanʼ tapa Ahira ahi hi.
verses.79: Ama piakte pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel za le sawm thum a gik ngun kuangdai khat, shekel sawm sagih a gik ngun kuang khat, an tawh biak nadingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel a dim tuak tawh;
verses.80: shekel sawm a gik kham pakan khat, paknamtui a dim tawh;
verses.81: meihal biak nadingin bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa khat,
verses.82: khialhna hanga biak nadingin keel a pa khat;
verses.83: le thunuam a biakpiak nadingin bawngtal nih, tuutal nga, keel a pa nga le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa nga ahi hi. Hihte pen Enanʼ tapa Ahiraʼ piak ahi hi.
verses.84: Biakna tau sathau a kinuh ni-in a piakte: Ngun kuangdai sawm le nih, ngun kuang sawm le nih,
verses.85: ngun kuangdai khat ciangin shekel za le sawm thum gikin ngun kuang khat ciangin shekel sawm sagih gik a, ngun kuangte khempeuh pen biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in shekel tul nih le za li gik hi.
verses.86: Paknamtui tawh a kidim kham pakan sawm le nihte, biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in khat ciangin shekel sawm gik a, kham pakan khempeuh pen shekel za le sawm nih gik hi.
verses.87: Meihal biak nadingin ganhing khempeuh pen bawngtal sawm le nih, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le nih, an-a biaknate tawh; le khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa sawm le nih,
verses.88: le thunuam a biakpiakna-in ganhing khempeuh bawngtal sawm nih le li, tuutal sawm guk, keel a pa sawm guk, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm guk ahi hi. Hihte pen biakna tau sathau a kinuh khit ciangin apna biakna ahi hi.
verses.89: Topa tawh a kiho dingin kikhopna buk sungah Moses a pai ciangin, kherub nihteʼ kikal, thuciamna singkuang tungah a om hehpihna tokhom tung san teng panin amah a hopih awging khat om a, tua awging in Moses a hopih hi.
